title: No blue essence refund
body: What did i do wrong? I had a mission witch should give me 60k blue essence but it didnt?I completed the mission and uit also told me that i got itbut its not on my account. Since yesterday. Is the ip that i spent on my runes gone now?!? I

replies.body: Have you checked your loot-tab? There should be a blue orb with your BE inside it!
